channel.title: CVE Feed for dovecot -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dovecot -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-3814|2024-08-04T19:19:18.590Z -- dovecot -- dovecot
item.description: It was discovered that Dovecot before versions 2.2.36.1 and 2.3.4.1 incorrectly handled client certificates. A remote attacker in possession of a valid certificate with an empty username field could possibly use this issue to impersonate other users.
